when shouldIncludeLinkageData returns true for a relationship, it contains linkage data for that relationship on all of the collection, regardless of includes
it includes linkage data for a has-many relationship that's being included
it can serialize a collection with a chain of has-many relationships
it can serialize a collection with a belongs-to relationship
it can serialize a collection with a chain of belongs-to relationships
